channel.title: Inception. Discuss.
channel.description:
Great movie. Many possibilities, and many points of discussion.
*SPOILER ALERT* spoilers may be possible, so if you haven't seen the movie, read with extreme caution.
The only thing I wanted more out of the movie, were more trippy enviroments. The paris expose was great. loved every second of it. (But I guess I know that they had to keep everything looking realistic for the target...still. Wanted to see more of those paradoxes in action :slight_smile: )

item.description:
Your mom. Are you serious, though, Ramirezoid?

IT TOPPLES IF YOU STAY AFTER THE CREDITS

item.title: Inception. Discuss.
item.dc:creator: koolkalang
item.description:
That would hurt. A lot. But damn if that wouldn’t be good training and be as good as the real thing, then I don’t know what is. Imagine with all that compounded time, how much experience you’ll gain.

And while typing I just made a connection that dreaming = hyperbolic time chamber in dragonball z. Only you can go deeper, and there are hyperbolic chambers inside hyperbolic chambers.

Read full topic

item.title: Inception. Discuss.
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
He did mention that the shared dreaming thing was made so soldiers could practice on each other without having to worry about killing each other. I think that’d be pretty cool if we could do that in real life .

Read full topic

item.title: Inception. Discuss.
item.dc:creator: koolkalang
item.description:
And for some reason I kept on thinking that he(the director) was also alluding to video games as a kind of dreaming for some reason…that scene with all those old people sleeping underground seemed to evoke a kind of Dreaming LAN party…maybe I’m reading too much into it, but it’s interesting to think of it that way.

Read full topic

item.title: Inception. Discuss.
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
koolkalang:

Well…talking about the finer points of the movie would probably be spoilery, but those are the interesting parts to get into…I think I missed the thing with the wedding ring, was that supposed to be his totem?

With his wedding ring, apparently in real life he wasn’t wearing a wedding ring and yet in the dreams he was (or maybe it was the other way around, not sure).

Read full topic

item.title: Inception. Discuss.
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
Yeah, more dreamscape like things would have been cool but the relative realism of the dreams I liked.

An EXTREMELY good movie, I’ve got to say. My favorite movie, actually. I’m a really big fan of multiple storylines and this movie played on that to the extreme. The time differences between each dream level made it a lot more enjoyable as well. I’m definitely getting the Blu-Ray when it comes out.

The ending was just holy shit. I’ve seen a lot of theories floating around on it too, one of which has to do with Cobb’s wedding ring.

Am I allowed to post spoilers in here?

Read full topic
